page.title: 13A Game we Play at School
page.content: Many games are played at school, but this is one of our favourites, called{'Nuts and Bolts':} one person stands in the middle and is 'it' and chooses someone to run. The runner may then call one of four things: {'Nuts'}and he runs on his own; {'Screws'}and he chooses someone to run with him;{'Nails'}and he chooses two people to run with him; and{'Bolts'} and everyone goes. If he is caught he helps the person who is it catch everyone else. If he gets across then everyone else tries to get across. The last person caught is it. The people who are it must stand ten yards from the home area at each end of the ground, which is where the runners have to try and run to.
